issue.title: YouTube doesn't work properly with AdGuard enabled
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.56

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

youtube.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> YouTube doesn't load properly with AdGuard on, turning it off solves the problem. Main page gets completely blank, nothing is loading.

issue.title: Facebook (Onion site) login / create account banner annoyance
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.49.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances ‚Äî pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.facebookwkhpilnemxj7asaniu7vnjjbiltxjqhye3mhbshg7kx5tfyd.onion/kadokawataiwan/photos/a.120278361071648/122858280813656/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Browser: Tor Browser (since it is about the Onion site, so Tor Browser or Brave's Tor window is needed)
2. When I click into Facebook posts, there is a banner urging the user to log in or to create an account. It is an annoyance since:
  * There is no way to close the banner
  * Comments and image are obscured by the banner, and there is no way to see the obscured part

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![screenshot-1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/103918092/5413892f-bca1-4f30-a211-b41fc0a23855)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![screenshot-2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/103918092/c8c0d5a6-b3a5-4e28-9b1f-2f018148cba4)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.49.3rc15

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.reddit.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
When ads appear, the bottom widget often disappears. Caused by `reddit.com##div[style="margin-left:24px;margin-top:0"][class] > div[class] > div[class^="_"]:not([data-redditstyle]):has(div[data-before-content="advertisement"])`
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-06-01 16-15-31](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/396501bb-4c74-462e-b2f2-3a46e1b9cdf2)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-06-01 16-15-36](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/02553d77-c6c8-491d-89cf-9002a55dcd82)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Not reproduced.
Please try these two rules:
```
reddit.com#@#div[style="margin-left:24px;margin-top:0"][class] > div[class] > div[class^="_"]:not([data-redditstyle]):has(div[data-before-content="advertisement"]
reddit.com##div[style="margin-left:24px;margin-top:0"][class] > div[class] > div[class^="_"]:not([data-redditstyle]) > div:has(div[data-before-content="advertisement"]
```

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.56

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

youtube.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> YouTube doesn't load properly with AdGuard on, turning it off solves the problem. Main page gets completely blank, nothing is loading.
Sometimes when I refresh the page it starts working but eg. the comments are not loading or the video is on but the rest of the page is blank, just the player with a blank background.

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1: what the player looks like with AdGuard on</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/135314713/417b537d-e72e-4716-8c84-db0ebfe6feb9)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N: what the YouTube main page looks like with AdGuard on</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/135314713/72be8d6f-5ffc-48ac-9b7e-513968a4a593)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: After clicking the "Nicht mehr anzeigen" button, it is still displayed.  Is it possible to open a new ticket?  Is it a new feature set for Adguard Android?  How could Adguard block this type in the future?  Is it possible in the future to use "Send to Adguard" like on YouTube?

comment.body:
Hello @shape55
This is the expected behavior of this filter. To make the "share" button appear, please add this rule to the custom filter:
`substack.com#@?#div > a[role="button"]:has(> div.label:contains(Share))`

pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Insults, spread rumors;
- [x] Damage to the reputation of others;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons ‚Äî share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances ‚Äî pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

Block bad website ‚Äúsharecuts.cn‚Äù

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151551

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Your comment

https://sharecuts.cn/post/4344

There are insults, spread rumors, damage to the reputation of others,
and a large number of other bad content on this website.See the issue.

I sincerely hope that the Adguard team will support justice and approve and merge this PR to protect the rights of users.üòÅ

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![IMG_0151](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/85857425/8a016d09-a0d5-4eae-a9d4-a702778b17d3)

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met
